cardList.name: NEET-PG exam 2021 to be held on September 11
cardList.desc: The National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (NEET PG)-2021 will be held on September 11. Union Minister Mansukh Mandaviya tweeted, We have decided to conduct NEET Postgraduate exam on September 11. NEET-PG was earlier scheduled to be conducted on April 18, but was postponed.
